verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You’re the all consuming fire
I worship You today
You’re the all consuming fire
Come and manifest Yourself
You’re the all consuming fire
I worship You today
You’re the all consuming fire
Come and manifest Yourself
You’ve got fire in Your eyes
Nothing hides from You
You see everything
Even the deepest secrets of men, Lord
Expose every evil
Consume every wickedness
You are the all consuming fire
Come and manifest Yourself
You’ve got fire in Your eyes
Nothing hides from You
You see everything, Lord
Even the deepest secrets of men
Expose every evil
Consume every wickedness
Give us the victory Lord
Come and manifest Yourself
Consuming fire, I worship You today
You’re the all consuming fire
Come and manifest Yourself
You’re the all consuming fire
I bow before Your throne
You’re the all consuming fire
Come and manifest Yourself
Consuming fire, I worship You today
You’re the all consuming fire
Come and manifest Yourself
You’re the all consuming fire
I bow before Your throne
You’re the all consuming fire
Come and manifest Yourself
Set my heart on fire
Make me a shining light
Set my soul on fire
Manifest Yourself through me
Speak through my voice Lord
See through my eyes
You are the all consuming fire
Come and manifest Yourself
Set my heart on fire
Make me a shining light
Set my soul on fire
Manifest Yourself through me
Speak through my voice Lord
See through my eyes
You are the all consuming fire
Come and manifest Yourself
Consuming fire I worship You today
You’re the all consuming fire
Come and manifest Yourself
Consuming fire
I bow before Your throne
You’re the all consuming fire
Come and manifest Yourself
You are the all consuming fire
With blazing fire in Your eyes
Consuming every evil works
Come and manifest Yourself
You are the all consuming fire
With blazing fire in Your eyes
Consuming every evil works
Come and manifest Yourself
You are the all consuming fire
With blazing fire in Your eyes
Consuming every evil works
Come and manifest Yourself
You are the all consuming fire
With blazing fire in Your eyes
Consuming every evil works
Come and manifest Yourself
You are the all consuming fire
With blazing fire in Your eyes
Consuming every evil works
Come and manifest Yourself
Consuming fire
Consuming fire
Consuming fire
Come and manifest Yourself
Consuming fire
Consuming fire
Consuming fire
Come and manifest Yourself
Consuming fire
Consuming fire
Consuming fire
Come and manifest Yourself
